# SCNParticleBirthLocation.vertex

**Case**

New particles can be created at only at the locations of the vertices in the emitter shape.

## Declaration

```swift
case vertex
```

## Constants

- **SCNParticleBirthLocation.surface**: New particles can be created at any location on the surface of the emitter shape.
- **SCNParticleBirthLocation.volume**: New particles can be created at any location within the volume of the emitter shape.
